thread.title: Mildred M Rutledge
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by Mildred M Rutledge

author: Mildred M Rutledge
title: Mildred M Rutledge
text: Although all the ordered items arrived in one piece and undamaged, one shipment contained an item that we did not order. Customer service was easy to contact and helped us to resolve the issue satisfactorily. When I order multiple items, I do not like so many items delayed and back ordered. When this happens the total credit card amount is not charged until the entire order is shipped, which is understandable; since the partial order is delayed because of unavailability or from being shipped from a different location, the item ought not to be charged until actually shipped, but the "chopped-up" shipments cause confusion with my credit card payment and prompts me to choose ordering only one item at a time or none at all.
